    RecursiveArrayTools.chain — Function.
    chain(xs...)

    Iterate through any number of iterators in sequence.

    julia> for i in chain(1:3, ['a', 'b', 'c'])
           @show i
       end
i = 1
i = 2
i = 3
i = 'a'
i = 'b'
i = 'c'

    RecursiveArrayTools.npartitions — Function.
    npartitions(A...)

    Retrieve number of partitions of ArrayPartitions in A..., or throw an error if there are ArrayPartitions with a different number of partitions.
